name: PAWssible Outcomes
description:
AMV

Cats + Lights & Mirrors Puzzle

Overview
  • Mocha cant find the laser, so Mochii the cat helps redirect the laser to Mocha. Mochii has to clear out the way for the laser to be redirected using mirrors.
  • Help Mochii the cat move and rotate mirrors to get his laser to an activated block.
Controls Keyboard and mouse
  • Up - W
  • Down - S
  • Left - A
  • Right - D
  • Action - Left mouse button / Spacebar
Controller
  • Movement - Left stick
  • Action - A button

Team Members
  • Victor Diaz - Programmer
  • Lara Lai - Art
  • Abhay Venugopal - Level Designer / Project Manager
